messages.title: FIGHTING FOR OUR SCHOOLS
messages.content: One of our first actions will be to give all schools the investment they need.

messages.title: FIGHTING FOR OUR ENVIRONMENT
messages.content: Only Labour will take the radical steps required to tackle climate crisis and invest in sustainable industries.

messages.title: FIGHTING FOR OUR LOCAL SERVICES
messages.content: One of our first priorities will be to ensure all of our services are properly funded and to fight to re-open the 20 beds that were closed at Leek Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Radical measures to tackle the climate crisis and investment in sustainable industries.
Proper funding for all services and re-opening of closed beds at Leek Hospital.

issues.education: Investment in schools is a priority.
issues.environment: Tackling the climate crisis with radical steps and investing in sustainable industries.
issues.health: Re-opening of closed beds at Leek Hospital.
